title: How do you buy champs?
body: How do you buy champs in the new client? I have 5300 IP and want to buy ekko who is 4800 and it says not yet implemented when I try to unlock and the legacy client is retired.What do I do?

replies.body:
It sounds like you're trying to purchase Ekko through your champion collection page. While you could buy champions from there in the old client, funnily enough, that feature hasn't been implemented in the new client yet. For the time being, you'll have to go into the actual store to buy anything!
